publication.title: Converting from a DEC system10 to VAX
publication.abstract: May 15th 1986, we unplugged our DECsystem-10 after 17 years of service, and replaced it with new VAXes. We had to not only learn a new system, but prepare our users for the changeover, and help them learn the VAX.We looked for ways to make sure DEC-10 users would know their computer was leaving. We surveyed users looking for potential
